title: Brandit Lord Canterbury Hooded Jacket Black
features: To fit chest (recommended): S 35"-38", M 38"-40", L 40"-43", XL 43"-45", XXL 45"-47"
Traditional English style with classic Harrington design. Protective hood with inner lining
Fashionable waist-length construction. Soft inner lining in fraser tartan check
Durable front metal zipper. Two buttoned down hand pockets. Elasticated cuffs and waistband
Outer shell material: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton. Lining material: 100% Acrylic. Sleeve lining: 100% Polyester
description: To fit chest (recommended): S 35"-38", M 38"-40", L 40"-43", XL 43"-45", XXL 45"-47". Presented Lord Canterbury Hooded Jacket from Brandit combines classic Harrington design with weather protective hood and warm checked fraser tartan inner lining. This traditional English style waist-length jacket comes with durable front metal zipper, soft tartan inner lining, two buttoned down hand pockets, and elasticated cuffs and waistband. Stylish and fashionable, the Lord Canterbury Hooded Jacket offers a great British look and feel, and is perfect for hobby, sports and leisure time.
